dict.acceptation: 敏锐的；锋利的；狡猾的，聪明的；尖锐的；
猛烈地；尖锐地；尖利地；偏高地；
升半音；尖头；骗子；内行，专家；

sent.orig: Demo C# (Sharp) grid system object specific methods.
sent.trans: 演示C#(sharp)制网格物体的具体方法。

sent.orig: No accessible sharp point, sharp edge or burr that pose potential hazard under normal use.
sent.trans: 在使用过程中可接触的部位不允许有伤害人体的锐角、快口、毛刺。

sent.orig: He was being continually press against ths sharp roof, which felt slimy as well as sharp.
sent.trans: 他不停的被推到洞顶，顶部粘呼呼一样很让人难受。

sent.orig: From far away drifted a faint, sharp yelp, followed by a chorus of similar sharp yelps.
sent.trans: 远方传来一阵微弱而尖锐的呼叫，随之是一阵相同的尖叫声的合奏。

sent.orig: A sharp crack might remain fairly sharp in granite, but degenerate a dull thud in sand.
sent.trans: 在花岗岩中尖锐的破裂声可以保留相当的强度，而在砂岩中则易变成低沉的轰响。
